name: columnValuesSumToBeBetween
displayName: Column Values Sum To Be Between
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValuesSumToBeBetween. Test the sum of the values of a col is within a range.

parameterDefinition.name: minValueForColSum
parameterDefinition.description: Expected sum of values in the column to be greater or equal than

parameterDefinition.name: maxValueForColSum
parameterDefinition.description: Expected sum values in the column to be lower or equal than
